messages.message: Hey <!subteam^SQBMK5MB9|@Automation & Productivity>, are refiner programs supposed to clobber the `'text'`  field of the IBOCR and replace it with the refined fields comma-separated? Not a huge deal for me currently, but has some interesting effects if you try to apply two different refiners in sequence (or just read `record.get_text()` on a post-refiner IBOCR)
yes @Erick. was initially done just ad-hoc, but SC relies on this feature now so we can’t change it :slightly_smiling_face: (unless migrating them off first).
@shaunak has thought about how to handle this in the IBDOC world — will let him comment on the best approach moving forward
